Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/92nd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial, near Commercial/92nd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

Allow extra travel time.
